channel.title: KillerHateScape v1 [DELTA BASED]
channel.description:
[center][font=Verdana][u][b]KillerHateScape[/b][/u][/font][/center]
Hey Guys i havent coded a server for over 1 year now and im just getting back into the hang of coding server's again so im going to start off easy and then get to more complicated things.... in this server source as it is i have only spent a few hours but in the v2 you will get way more things...
[center]In this server as it is now...[/center] [center]I Have fixed the dupe... added an automated message... added a yell command... altered the starter things slightly changed the home to start in barbarian village... fixed slayer staffs and a player counter and server name at top and last but not least... a ::players command that works with player list and combat lvl[/center]
[center]In the V2 there will be more updates[/center] [center]new training areas, skilling places, staffzones, more commands, more npc's, barrows, jad, and fixes to things like the real vengeance![/center]
MY WORK...
New Home with player counter and title: [IMG]http://i631.photobucket.com/albums/uu34/sophiebaybee/Home.jpg[/img] AutoMated Message: [IMG]http://i631.photobucket.com/albums/uu34/sophiebaybee/automatedmessage.jpg[/img] ::players command: [IMG]http://i631.photobucket.com/albums/uu34/sophiebaybee/playerscommand.jpg[/img]
Thats all the images i could get... the ::yell command image is not in but it is cool... HOPE YOU LIKE IT!
thank you....
DL LINK: http://uppit.com/v/WSRSHXS1
CREDS 50% to me 50% to delta for base...
creds will change to 90% me in later versions.
